trans-unit.source: Folder where the configuration file is located.: Possible paths: 1) Absolute (/var/www/shared/in2publish/), 2) Relative (typo3conf/AdditionalConfiguration/) 3) Extension source (EXT:in2publish_conf/Resources/Private/Config/)

Disable UserTS configuration.: Parts of the Content Publisher configurations can be overwritten individually on a per user basis. This is done by setting values per UserTS. If you tick this box the UserTS for the Content Publisher will be ignored.
